import React, { Component, useRef, useState } from 'react' import { Button, Checkbox, Form, Input, Radio, Select, TextArea, Header, } from 'semantic-ui-react' import {Message} from '../components/Message' const CreatePubForm = () => { const [title, setTitle] = useState('') const [content, setContent] = useState('') const [file, setFile] = useState('') const fileInputRef = useRef() return(
Create your publication
setTitle(e.target.value)} placeholder='Title' /> setContent(e.target.value)} label='Content' placeholder='Publication content ...' /> {file?:''}
) } export default CreatePubForm
